RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 18, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Reg istered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $6,250).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MR CLINE four wide run into first turn, pressured leader to far turn and roused into stretch to edge away late. KEEN ON YOU chased top pair to the stretch, inherited pace spot in the final stages while best of the rest. RUBINSTEIN inside speed to due with winner to quarter pole faltered to third. TOMAHAWK KITTEN raced along evenly with no response when needed. HARD LIGHTING never factored throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Keen On You
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top pair to the stretch, inherited pace spot best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Lighting
ENTRY.COMMENT: never factored throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Tomahawk Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Rubinstein
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to due with winner to quarter pole faltered to third

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Cline
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: four wide run first turn, pressured leader to far turn, edged off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Claiming Purse 9000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRASSROOTS inside dueling to far turn, angled out sharply past the quarter pole to run clear in the stretch run to the wire. MR JOKE speed between horses to far turn, dueled into stretch, outkicked. JACK THE BIRD three wide run to far turn while evenly throughout. THE BIG NAUGHTY always trailed while never in contention.

ENTRY.NAME: Grassroots
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside dueling to far turn, angled out sharply quarter pole clear

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Joke
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed between horses to far turn, dueled into stretch, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Jack the Bird
ENTRY.COMMENT: three wide run to far turn while evenly throughout

ENTRY.NAME: The Big Naughty
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed while never in contention

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 5F Turf CR: 56. Allowance Purse 25600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 18, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Preference To Horses Tha t Have Not Started For Less Than $16,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUCKEYE PRINCESS awkward from gate, regrouped to turn, loved the grass dominated. MR. BALI saved ground throughout, rallied along in the stretch no match. SHOWTIME BOY sprung to the front quickly, led to turn, stayed on for show spot. GRAY DAY raced between horses to the stretch with no late response stretch. FACTUM'S STAR tried to keep up to turn, weakened in the stretch run. MUSIC GEM awkward from gate, never untracked throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Bali
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout, rallied along in the stretch no match

ENTRY.NAME: Factum's Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up to turn, weakened in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Gray Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced between horses to the stretch with no late response stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Music Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start never untracked throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Buckeye Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward from gate, regrouped to turn, loved the grass dominated

ENTRY.NAME: Showtime Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprung to the front quickly, led to turn, stayed on for show spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BROGUE off rail trip to far turn never far back, rallied stretch cleared. ONORE lagged back to far turn with a late run for place spot. REVENGE TOUR speed to the front, led to the half, weakened for the show spot. ROYALLY FLUSHED good position never far back to turn, gained short lead weakened. INMYDREAMS brief speed to the half with nothing left from that point. HEARTFELT KARTER always trailed throughout.

ENTRY.COMMENT: good position never far back to turn, gained short lead weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Onore

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 56. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 18, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRANADICA two path speed to duel for a half, shook free in the stretch and held sway to the wire under stout handling. ABIGAIL G chased top pair to the stretch, urged on for the place spot. THREE POINT KUZ raced along evenly throughout with no late response, settled 3rd. MAXIMUM JOY inside speed, dueled to quarter pole, came up empty in stretch. SISTER JUSTICE always trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Maximum Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, dueled to quarter pole, came up empty in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Abigail G
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top pair to the stretch, urged on for the place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Sister Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Three Point Kuz
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly throughout with no late response, settled 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Granadica
ENTRY.COMMENT: two path speed to duel for a half, shook free stretch held sway

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 1 1/16M Turf CR: 91. Handicap Purse 20000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE-YEARS-OLDS AND UPWARD. Free Nomination by Tuesday August 8, 2023. Weights Assigned by Friday August 11, 2023. Starters to be named through the entry box by the usual time of closing. High Weights and Ohio Bred Preferred. Sho uld this race be determined to run on the dirt the distance will remain the same. Nominations closed Tuesday, August 8, 2023 with 25 nominations. (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COMMANDANDCONTROL settled in early from off rail, rallied inside from the half with a steady run while going away to the wire under confident handling. KICK OUT THE JAMS trailed for a half, steady run to far turn, angle out good effort. DISTINCTIVE FLOWER speed to the front dueled early on, spurted clear. good effort. QUERIDINHA LECA saved ground first turn to far turn, closed between horses late. CALLMEMARTHAJANE saved ground to chase top pair to the half, faded stretch run. MISS MOON PIE speed to duel through first turn, game far turn, faltered stretch. GOODNESS SAKES steadily faded from inside with no excuse. MYSTIQUE SABOTEUR ran up four wide first turn, dropped far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Kick Out the Jams
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed for a half, steady run to far turn, angle out good effort

ENTRY.NAME: Callmemarthajane
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to chase top pair to the half, faded stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Distinctive Flower
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front dueled early on, spurted clear. good effort

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Moon Pie
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to duel through first turn, game far turn, faltered stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Goodness Sakes
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadily faded from inside with no excuse

ENTRY.NAME: Queridinha Leca
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground first turn to far turn, closed between horses late

ENTRY.NAME: Mystique Saboteur
ENTRY.COMMENT: ran up four wide first turn, dropped far back

ENTRY.NAME: Commandandcontrol
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled early off rail, rallied inside from the half, going away

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 94. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 18, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TROJAN TALE sat chilly to the turn, galloped past leader past the quarter pole and ran clear while ridden out in a good effort. BRILLIANT JOURNEY sprinted to the front, collared turn, no match stretch held place. CHIEF BUCKEYE bobbled at the start, inside run to turn chasing leaders for show. HIP HIP HOORAY tried to keep up off rail to turn, stayed game in stretch inside. DASH OF FIRE always trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Trojan Tale
ENTRY.COMMENT: sat chilly to turn, galloped past leader cleared while ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Brilliant Journey
ENTRY.OWNER: Mark D Kuntz LLC and Dalton Kenneth W
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted to the front, collared turn, no match stretch held place

ENTRY.NAME: Chief Buckeye

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M Turf CR: 72. Claiming Purse 13600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 18, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred )(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RECOGNIZE ME lagged back to far turn, roused, responded, with an explosive late move to edge clear under confident handling to the wire. SPLIT DECISION trailed to the half, followed winner, split horses late gamely. SYLLABUS rail trip to far turn rallied along off rail stretch good effort. FLORIS good position off rail to far turn, between horses stretch gamely. LUCKY SHORE rushed up off rail through first turn to contend, gamely stretch. SHE'S A KEEPER widest run first turn, stayed outside far turn to lead faltered. GET CLEAR tried to keep up, inside into far turn, weakened in the stretch. ZERO CLICK inside speed to the front, battled to far turn, gave in stretch. CORIMA chased pace to the half with nothing left and dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Zero Click
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front, battled to far turn, gave in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Corima
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to the half with nothing left and dropped back

ENTRY.NAME: Recognize Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged back to far turn, roused, responded, explosive late move

ENTRY.NAME: Floris
ENTRY.OWNER: Duvall William E and French Miranda
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position off rail to far turn, between horses stretch gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Get Clear
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up, inside into far turn, weakened in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Shore
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up off rail through first turn to contend, gamely stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Syllabus
ENTRY.COMMENT: rail trip to far turn rallied along off rail stretch good effort

ENTRY.NAME: Split Decision
ENTRY.OWNER: Bantry Farms Bownes Kelly and Tier Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to the half, followed winner, split horses late gamely

ENTRY.NAME: She's a Keeper
